doc.description: 人员目录树关系列表查询

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_MyMenu.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ um.pid, um.userid, u.fullname, um.menuid, m.nodename, m.nodemark, m.nodeurl /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_sm_user u, bs_t_sm_menutree m, bs_t_sm_usermenutree um where 1=1 and um.userid = u.pid and um.menuid = m.pid $customwhere$ $privilege$ /*ORDERBY*/ order by /*ORDERBY*/ um.userid, um.menuid
